content: Continue on the path, where you'll be jumping into a gap on the left just before the flames -- a Flamling will appear as you get there. Pay close attention to this wall of flames on the right, because we'll be coming back here soon.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Field_of_Fire_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Field of Fire Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Ashen Pass III' and the sub-subsection 'Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai'.
The content is as follows:
Continue on the path, where you'll be jumping into a gap on the left just before the flames -- a Flamling will appear as you get there. Pay close attention to this wall of flames on the right, because we'll be coming back here soon.
